verses.verse: It <S%H3615>happened,<s%> when he had made an end of <S%H1696>speaking<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> that the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> was <S%H7194>knit<s%> with the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> him as his own <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and would <S%H5414>let<s%> him go no more <S%H7725>home<s%> to his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H7725>house.<s%>
Then <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> because he <S%H160>loved<s%> him as his own <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

<S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H6584>stripped<s%> himself of the <S%H4598>robe<s%> that was on <S%H5414>him,<s%> and gave it to <S%H1732>David,<s%> and his <S%H4055>clothing,<s%> even to his <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and to his <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and to his <S%H2289>sash.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> wherever <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7919>him,<s%> and behaved himself wisely: and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> him over the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and it was <S%H3190>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and also in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

It happened as they <S%H935>came,<s%> when <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from the <S%H5221>slaughter<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> that the <S%H802>women<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> of all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7891>singing<s%> and <S%H4246>dancing,<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> with <S%H8596>tambourines,<s%> with <S%H8057>joy,<s%> and with instruments of <S%H7991>music.<s%>

The <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H6030>sang<s%> one to another as they <S%H7832>played,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7586>"Saul<s%> has <S%H5221>slain<s%> his <S%H505>thousands,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> his ten <S%H505>thousands.<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry,<s%> and this <S%H1697>saying<s%> <S%H3415>displeased<s%> <S%H559>him;<s%> and he said, "They have <S%H5414>ascribed<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> ten <S%H7233>thousands,<s%> and to me they have <S%H5414>ascribed<s%> but <S%H505>thousands.<s%> What can he have more but the <S%H4410>kingdom?<s%>"
<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5770>eyed<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> from that <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H1973>forward.<s%>

It happened on the next <S%H4283>day,<s%> that an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> mightily on <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and he <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5059>played<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> as he did day by <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had his <S%H2595>spear<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%>

and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H2904>threw<s%> the <S%H2595>spear;<s%> for he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H5221>pin<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> even to the <S%H7023>wall!<s%>" <S%H1732>David<s%> escaped <S%H5437>from<s%> his <S%H6440>presence<s%> <S%H6471>twice.<s%>
<S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was with <S%H5493>him,<s%> and was departed from <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

Therefore <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5493>removed<s%> him from <S%H7760>him,<s%> and made him his <S%H8269>captain<s%> over a <S%H505>thousand;<s%> and he went <S%H3318>out<s%> and came <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> behaved himself <S%H7919>wisely<s%> in all his <S%H1870>ways;<s%> and Yahweh was with <S%H3068>him.<s%>
When <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he <S%H7919>behaved<s%> himself <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7919>wisely,<s%> he stood in <S%H1481>awe<s%> of <S%H6440>him.<s%>
But all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H1732>David;<s%> for he went <S%H3318>out<s%> and came <S%H935>in<s%> before <S%H6440>them.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1419>"Behold,<s%> my elder <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H4764>Merab,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> her to you as <S%H802>wife.<s%> Only be <S%H1121>valiant<s%> for <S%H3898>me,<s%> and fight <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4421>battles.<s%>" For <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3027>"Don't<s%> let my hand be on <S%H3027>him,<s%> but let the hand of the Philistines be on <S%H6430>him.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> "Who am <S%H2416>I,<s%> and what is my life, or my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4940>family<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that I should be <S%H2860>son-in<s%>-law to the <S%H4428>king?<s%>"

But it happened at the <S%H6256>time<s%> when <S%H4764>Merab,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> should have been <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> that she was <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H5741>Adriel<s%> the <S%H4259>Meholathite<s%> as <S%H802>wife.<s%>

<S%H4324>Michal,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H1732>David;<s%> and they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> pleased <S%H3474>him.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> her to <S%H4170>him,<s%> that she may be a snare to <S%H3027>him,<s%> and that the hand of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> may be against <S%H7586>him.<s%> Therefore Saul <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "You shall this <S%H3117>day<s%> be my <S%H2859>son-in<s%>-law a second <S%H8147>time.<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H1696>"Talk<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3909>secretly,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4428><s%> 'Behold, the king has <S%H2654>delight<s%> in <S%H5650>you,<s%> and all his servants <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H4428>you:<s%> now therefore be the king's <S%H2859>son-in<s%>-law.'"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> those <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Does it <S%H5869>seems<s%> to you a <S%H7043>light<s%> thing to be the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2859>son-in<s%>-law, since I am a <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and lightly <S%H7034>esteemed?<s%>"
The <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, <S%H1732>"David<s%> <S%H5046>spoke<s%> like <S%H1697>this.<s%>"

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H4428><s%> 'The king <S%H2656>desires<s%> no <S%H4119>dowry<s%> except one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6190>foreskins<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> to be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H341>enemies.<s%>'" Now <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H2803>thought<s%> to make <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

When his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> these <S%H1697>words,<s%> it <S%H1697>pleased<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> well to be the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2859>son-in<s%>-law. The <S%H3117>days<s%> were not <S%H4390>expired;<s%>

and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3212>went,<s%> he and his <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H5221>killed<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men;<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H6190>foreskins,<s%> and they gave them in full <S%H4390>number<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> that he might be the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2859>son-in<s%>-law. <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H4324>Michal<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> as <S%H802>wife.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> and <S%H3045>knew<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was with <S%H1732>David;<s%> and <S%H4324>Michal,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> loved <S%H157>him.<s%>
<S%H7586>Saul<s%> was yet the <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> <S%H1732>David;<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H3117>continually.<s%>

Then the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> went <S%H3318>forth:<s%> and it <S%H1767>happened,<s%> as often as they went <S%H3318>forth,<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> behaved himself more <S%H7919>wisely<s%> than all the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul;<s%> so that his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3966>highly<s%> <S%H3365>esteemed.<s%>
